      • getCommand

        public static int getCommand(java.util.Scanner scan)
        Receives a move using the command line.
        Parameters:
        scan - The input buffer
        Returns:
        1 if player goes up, 2 if down, 3 if left, 4 if right, 5 if no-move and 0 for invalid inputs.
